mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO(COM_CODE, APPROVE_STATE, APPROVE_DATE, SEND_DATE, AUTH_TYPE, POINT,REG_DW_USER_IDX,UP_DW_USER_IDX) VALUES (#{COM_CODE}, #{APPROVE_STATE}, sysdate, sysdate, #{AUTH_TYPE}, #{POINT}, #{REG_DW_USER_IDX}, #{UP_DW_USER_IDX})

INSERT INTO SC_AUDIT_ITEM_POINT(COM_CODE, AUDIT_ID, AUTH_TYPE, POINT, AUDIT_COMMENT, AUTH_SEQ, REG_COM_USER_IDX, REG_DATE) VALUES (#{COM_CODE}, #{AUDIT_ID}, #{AUTH_TYPE}, #{POINT}, #{AUDIT_COMMENT}, #{AUTH_SEQ}, #{REG_COM_USER_IDX}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO where AUTH_TYPE=#{AUTH_TYPE} and COM_CODE=#{COM_CODE}
select COUNT(*) from SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO where AUTH_TYPE=#{AUTH_TYPE} and COM_CODE=#{COM_CODE}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC_AUTH_FILE(COM_CODE, AUTH_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, AUTH_SEQ) VALUES (#{COM_CODE}, #{AUTH_TYPE}, #{FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_PATH}, #{AUTH_SEQ})
mapper.select: SELECT CC.COM_CODE, CC.COM_NAME, ACI.AUTH_TYPE, ACI.APPROVE_STATE, TO_CHAR(ACI.APPROVE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APPROVE_DATE, TO_CHAR(ACI.SEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SEND_DATE, ACI.POINT, ACI.AUTH_SEQ, ACI.UP_DW_USER_IDX, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM SC_USER_INFO UI WHERE UI.USER_IDX = ACI.UP_DW_USER_IDX) AS WORK_USER_NAME, ACI.REASON FROM SC_COMPANY_CODE CC LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO ACI ON CC.COM_CODE = ACI.COM_CODE AND ACI.AUTH_TYPE = #{AUTH_TYPE} WHERE CC.COM_CODE = #{COM_CODE}

SELECT ACI.COM_CODE, ACI.AUTH_TYPE, APPROVE_STATE, TO_CHAR(APPROVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as APPROVE_DATE, POINT, AF.FILE_NAME, AF.FILE_PATH, AF.FILE_TYPE, AF.AUTH_SEQ FROM SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO ACI INNER JOIN SC_AUTH_FILE AF ON AF.COM_CODE = ACI.COM_CODE AND AF.AUTH_TYPE = ACI.AUTH_TYPE WHERE ACI.AUTH_TYPE=#{AUTH_TYPE} and ACI.COM_CODE=#{COM_CODE}

SELECT COALESCE(IACI.COM_CODE, #{COM_CODE}) AS COM_CODE, (SELECT CC.COM_NAME FROM SC_COMPANY_CODE CC WHERE CC.COM_CODE = COALESCE(IACI.COM_CODE, #{COM_CODE})) AS COM_NAME, BC.BASE_VALUE AS AUTH_TYPE, BC.BASE_NAME AS AUTH_CODE, BC.BASE_OPTION AS FULL_POINT, AUTH_TYPE, AUDIT_WAY, APPROVE_STATE, TO_CHAR(APPROVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APPROVE_DATE, TO_CHAR(SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SEND_DATE, POINT FROM (SELECT * FROM SC_base_code WHERE GROUP_CODE != BASE_CODE AND BASE_STATUS ='Y' AND GROUP_CODE ='AUDIT_MENU') BC LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO IACI ON BC.BASE_CODE = IACI.AUTH_TYPE AND IACI.COM_CODE = #{COM_CODE} ORDER BY BC.BASE_SORT ASC

SELECT CC.COM_CODE, CC.COM_NAME, ACI.AUDIT_WAY, ACI.APPROVE_STATE, TO_CHAR(ACI.APPROVE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APPROVE_DATE, TO_CHAR(ACI.SEND_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SEND_DATE, ACI.POINT, CASE WHEN MAX(CASE WHEN CM.TANTALUM_YN = 'Y' OR CM.TUNGSTEN_YN = 'Y' OR CM.TIN_YN = 'Y' OR CM.GOLD_YN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CMRT, CASE WHEN MAX(CASE WHEN CM.COBALT_YN = 'Y' OR CM.MICA_YN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS EMRT FROM SC_COMPANY_CODE CC LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO ACI ON CC.COM_CODE = ACI.COM_CODE AND ACI.AUTH_TYPE = 'QUALITY' LEFT JOIN SC_CONFLICT_MINERAL CM ON CC.COM_CODE = CM.COM_CODE WHERE 1 =1
AND (CC.COM_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_CODE}), '%'))
AND (CC.COM_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_NAME}), '%'))
AND (ACI.APPROVE_STATE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_STATUS}), '%'))
AND (ACI.AUDIT_WAY LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{AUDIT_WAY}), '%'))
GROUP BY CC.COM_CODE, CC.COM_NAME, ACI.AUDIT_WAY, ACI.APPROVE_STATE, ACI.APPROVE_DATE, ACI.SEND_DATE, ACI.POINT
